member.name: T:Panda.DynamicWebApi.AssemblyDynamicWebApiOptions
member.summary: Specifies the dynamic webapi options for the assembly.

member.name: P:Panda.DynamicWebApi.AssemblyDynamicWebApiOptions.ApiPrefix
member.summary:
Routing prefix for all APIs
Default value is null.

member.name: P:Panda.DynamicWebApi.AssemblyDynamicWebApiOptions.HttpVerb
member.summary:
API HTTP Verb.
Default value is null.

member.name: P:Panda.DynamicWebApi.DynamicWebApiOptions.DefaultHttpVerb
member.summary:
API HTTP Verb.
Default value is "POST".

member.name: P:Panda.DynamicWebApi.DynamicWebApiOptions.DefaultApiPrefix
member.summary:
Routing prefix for all APIs
Default value is "api".

member.name: P:Panda.DynamicWebApi.DynamicWebApiOptions.RemoveControllerPostfixes
member.summary:
Remove the dynamic API class(Controller) name postfix.
Default value is {"AppService", "ApplicationService", "Service", "Services"}.

member.name: P:Panda.DynamicWebApi.DynamicWebApiOptions.RemoveActionPostfixes
member.summary:
Remove the dynamic API class's method(Action) postfix.
Default value is {"Async"}.

member.name: P:Panda.DynamicWebApi.DynamicWebApiOptions.GetRestFulActionName
member.summary: The method that processing the name of the action.

member.name: P:Panda.DynamicWebApi.DynamicWebApiOptions.AssemblyDynamicWebApiOptions
member.summary: Specifies the dynamic webapi options for the assembly.

member.name: M:Panda.DynamicWebApi.DynamicWebApiOptions.Valid
member.summary: Verify that all configurations are valid

member.name: M:Panda.DynamicWebApi.DynamicWebApiOptions.AddAssemblyOptions(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add the dynamic webapi options for the assembly.

member.name: M:Panda.DynamicWebApi.Helpers.ReflectionHelper.GetSingleAttributeOrNull``1(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a single attribute for a member.
member.param: The member that will be checked for the attribute
member.returns: Returns the attribute object if found. Returns null if not found.
